users.views module

class users.views.UserViewSet(**kwargs)[source]

Bases: ModelViewSet

ViewSet for managing User instances. Provides endpoints for user registration, login, and retrieving user info. :param self – instance of the viewset:

Returns:

Various HTTP responses based on the action performed.

basename = None
description = None
detail = None
get_permissions()[source]

Assigns permissions based on action. Registration and login are open to all, other actions require authentication.

login(request)[source]

Personalized endpoint for user login. POST /api/users/login/ arguments: request – HttpRequest object returns: JWT tokens and user info if authentication is successful

name = None
permission_classes = [<class 'rest_framework.permissions.IsAuthenticated'>]

alias of UserRegisterSerializer
